text: (bright music)
- I wanted to get into the cloud
and what better company than AWS,
when it comes to the cloud.

- As a technical cloud manager,
I cater to my customers need
I align with their roadmaps strategies.
- The most exciting part of my job

is to be able to figure out
really complex problems.
- What I love about being a TAM
is that each day is different.

- To get to work with some
very distinguished engineers
on new initiatives.

I learn new technologies,
new services, every day.

- My manager sent me this
little Lego of myself
with a little certificate in their hand.
And then they're building blocks
that I can continue to add to that.

- At AWS, we really do
value work life harmony.
- To be able to coach my five year old
gives me an honest happiness.

- I enjoy plants that
really allows me to unwind.
- I have a small puppy.
She's all over me all the time.
I'm heavy, hey (laughs).
- I always tell the girls that I mentor
I love puzzle solving,
and this is a perfect career

if that's something that
you're passionate about.
- [Abhishek] The fact that working at AWS
gives you an opportunity
to work with a diverse set of individuals
on the most advanced technologies
for the largest organizations,
and really see your contribution
as something that nobody should miss.
(bright music)
